author: Tyler Clifford
title: Cramer's lightning round: Disney 'has a great long-term situation brewing'
description: Jim Cramer takes calls and delivers answers to viewers' questions about their favorite stock picks in rapid speed.
content:
New Relic: "We have to have New Relic back on. ... I don't really quite understand how it could have such a degradation."
Leidos Holdings: "That is a winner."
Disney: "I think that [CEO] Bob Iger has a great long-term situation brewing and I do believe that… [+626 chars]
